document_data.mainbody:
anynests was a finch that served as a messenger for Lord Erlan Duirsar of Evereska during the late 14 century DR.
The excitable bird could communicate with Evereskan elves in the language they referred to as "peeptalk".
Manynests proved himself a brave and trusted ally as he delivered messages between elven sentries and Lord Duirsar when the phaerimm threatened Evereska in the .
